title: Former officer sues police over rape case response | 7NEWS
description: Former WA police officer Nicole Edwards is taking legal action against WA Police, alleging the force minimised her reports of being drugged, raped and recorded by fellow officer Adrian Moore. Moore is serving WA's harshest sexual offender sentenceâ€”three decadesâ€”for crimes against 13 women over 12 years, described as sadistic and depraved. Supreme Court documents claim internal affairs failed to properly investigate Edwards' complaints despite confronting video evidence of her distress. title: Nationals and Liberals at odds over Coalition split
description: The fallout from the Coalition's split yesterday has continued, with many Liberal MPs saying they refuse to be part of a coalition led by Nationals leader David Littleproud. #nationals #liberals #coalition #auspol #davidlittleproud

title: Manhunt for gunman after deadly NSW shooting | 7NEWS
description: A manhunt is underway in Central West New South Wales for 37-year-old Julian Ingram, wanted for murder after a shooting rampage in Lake Cargelligo, west of Condobolin. Three people are dead and one man is critically injured following shootings at two locations, where a woman believed to be the gunman's pregnant ex-partner and her new boyfriend were shot in a car, before the gunman opened fire on her relatives at a nearby home. title: National mourning held for Bondi terror victims | 7NEWS
description: Australia held a national day of mourning for victims of the Bondi terror attack, with flags at half-mast, a minute's silence at 7:01, and fifteen pillars of light illuminating landmarks across the country. Prime Minister Anthony Albanese issued a formal apology to the Jewish community for failing to keep people safe and acknowledged the trauma felt by Jewish Australians. The government passed landmark hate speech and gun reform laws earlier in the week, with promises of stronger action against anti-Semitism. title: Zelenskyy slams Europe as US finalises Ukraine security deal | 7NEWS
description: US President Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy have finalised a security agreement following high-level discussions in Switzerland. Zelenskyy delivered sharp criticism of European leaders, accusing them of failing to defend freedom and warning that Europe risks not being taken seriously if it doesn't establish military bases to protect against Russia and China. The agreement comes as peace negotiations between Ukraine, the US and Russia are scheduled for later this week. description: US President Donald Trump has officially launched his Board of Peace during the Davos meeting in Switzerland. #trump #donaldtrump #boardofpeace #davos #switzerland

title: Zelensky accuses allies of relying on the US
description: A security agreement between the US and Ukraine has been finalised in the event of a ceasefire with Russia, as Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky accused his European allies of failing to defend peace. #ukraine #russia #trump #ceasefire #zelensky

title: Sussan Ley vows to stay amid coalition crisis | 7NEWS
description: Liberal leader Sussan Ley faces intense scrutiny following the collapse of the coalition agreement with the Nationals, triggered by leader David Littleproud's decision to end the partnership. The split occurred during a pressure-filled week when parliament voted on legislation addressing anti-Semitism and radical Islamic extremism. Ley insists she will remain as leader despite reported anger from Liberal MPs and maintains the door remains open for coalition reconciliation. title: Manhunt underway after deadly NSW shooting | 7NEWS
description: A manhunt is underway in New South Wales Central West for Julian Ingram, an Aboriginal male wanted in connection with a deadly shooting near Lake Adjaleco that has left three people dead and one seriously injured. Police believe the suspect, who is considered armed and dangerous, was known to the victims through a domestic violence relationship and is travelling in a Ford Ranger utility with registration DM07GZ. Multiple police units from western and southern regions have been deployed to conduct a wide-scale search of the area.  CORRECTION 0:46: the name of the suspect is Julian Ingram, also known as Julian Pierpoint. title: Coalition collapses as Nationals break with Liberals | 7NEWS
description: The Liberal-National Coalition has collapsed following a dispute over a freedom of speech bill, with National Party leader David Littleproud announcing the alliance cannot continue under Susan Lee's Liberal leadership. Three National senators resigned after voting against the bill, and when Lee accepted their resignations, the entire National Party ministry threatened to walk. Littleproud maintains the Coalition can only be restored if the three senators are reinstated, while both leaders face mounting pressure over their political futures. title: Gunman on the run after three people shot dead in Lake Cargelligo, NSW
description: A gunman is on the run after three people were shot dead at Lake Cargelligo in Central West NSW on Thursday afternoon. Julian Ingram, 37, is believed to have shot dead his pregnant ex-partner and her new boyfriend in a car on Bokhara Street.   If you or someone you know is impacted by sexual assault, domestic or family violence, call 1800RESPECT on 1800 737 732 or visit 1800RESPECT.org.au  #lakecargelligo #centralwestnsw #nsw #nswpolice

title: 'An hour before, they cancelled it': Trump claims he stopped 837 executions | 7NEWS
description: President Trump on Air Force One has revealed a massive US military fleet is heading toward Iran and claims his threat of unprecedented strikes caused Iran to cancel 837 planned executions just one hour before they were scheduled.  Trump warned Iran would be "hit harder than ever" if the executions proceeded.   Trump also discussed sending Jared Kushner to Moscow for Ukraine peace talks following a meeting with President Zelensky, ongoing Greenland negotiations with NATO involvement, US oil operations in Venezuela, his upcoming April trip to China, and plans for extensive midterm campaign travel.
